service: image-analysis

# Use AWS profile from environment or default
# Set AWS_PROFILE environment variable or use --aws-profile flag
# Example: AWS_PROFILE=myprofile serverless deploy

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: ${opt:region, 'us-east-1'}
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  profile: ${opt:aws-profile, env:AWS_PROFILE, 'default'}
  deploymentBucket:
    name: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-deployment-${self:provider.region}
  memorySize: 512
  timeout: 29
  environment:
    # Optional: If not using Secrets Manager, fallback to environment variables
    HIVE_API_KEY: ${env:HIVE_API_KEY, ''}
    HIVE_ENDPOINT: ${env:HIVE_ENDPOINT, 'https://api.thehive.ai/api/v3/chat/completions'}
    S3_BUCKET_NAME: !Ref ImageBucket
    # Secrets Manager and SSM configuration
    HIVE_API_KEY_SECRET_NAME: ${env:HIVE_API_KEY_SECRET_NAME, 'catfish/hive-api-key'}
    HIVE_ENDPOINT_PARAM_NAME: ${env:HIVE_ENDPOINT_PARAM_NAME, '/catfish/hive-endpoint'}
    S3_BUCKET_PARAM_NAME: ${env:S3_BUCKET_PARAM_NAME, '/catfish/s3-bucket-name'}
    # Cognito configuration
    COGNITO_USER_POOL_ID: !Ref CognitoUserPool
    COGNITO_USER_POOL_CLIENT_ID: !Ref CognitoUserPoolClient
    COGNITO_USER_POOL_DOMAIN: !GetAtt CognitoUserPoolDomain.Domain
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - s3:PutObject
            - s3:PutObjectAcl
            - s3:GetObject
          Resource:
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:s3:::${ImageBucket}/*'
            # Allow access to all S3 buckets (needed when bucket name comes from SSM/env)
            # In production, restrict this to specific bucket ARNs
            - 'arn:aws:s3:::*/*'
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - s3:ListBucket
          Resource:
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:s3:::${ImageBucket}'
            - 'arn:aws:s3:::*'
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - secretsmanager:GetSecretValue
            - secretsmanager:DescribeSecret
          Resource:
            # AWS Secrets Manager ARNs include a random suffix, so we need to match the pattern
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:secretsmanager:${self:provider.region}:*:secret:catfish/*-*'
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:secretsmanager:${self:provider.region}:*:secret:catfish/*'
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - ssm:GetParameter
            - ssm:GetParameters
          Resource:
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:ssm:${self:provider.region}:*:parameter/catfish/*'
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - logs:CreateLogGroup
            - logs:CreateLogStream
            - logs:PutLogEvents
          Resource:
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:logs:${self:provider.region}:*:log-group:/aws/lambda/${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-*:*'
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:Query
          Resource:
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-requests'
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-requests/index/*'
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - cognito-idp:AdminInitiateAuth
            - cognito-idp:AdminRespondToAuthChallenge
            - cognito-idp:AdminGetUser
            - cognito-idp:AdminCreateUser
            - cognito-idp:AdminUpdateUserAttributes
            - cognito-idp:AdminDeleteUser
            - cognito-idp:ListUsers
            - cognito-idp:DescribeUserPool
            - cognito-idp:AssociateSoftwareToken
            - cognito-idp:VerifySoftwareToken
          Resource:
            - !Sub 'arn:aws:cognito-idp:${self:provider.region}:*:userpool/*'
            - !GetAtt CognitoUserPool.Arn

functions:
  analyzeImage:
    handler: image-analysis-handler.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: analyze
          method: post
          cors: true

resources:
  Resources:
    ImageBucket:
      Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
      Properties:
        PublicAccessBlockConfiguration:
          BlockPublicAcls: false
          BlockPublicPolicy: false
          IgnorePublicAcls: false
          RestrictPublicBuckets: false
        CorsConfiguration:
          CorsRules:
            - AllowedHeaders:
                - '*'
              AllowedMethods:
                - GET
                - PUT
                - POST
                - HEAD
              AllowedOrigins:
                - '*'
              ExposedHeaders:
                - ETag
              MaxAge: 3000
    ImageBucketPolicy:
      Type: AWS::S3::BucketPolicy
      Properties:
        Bucket: !Ref ImageBucket
        PolicyDocument:
          Statement:
            - Sid: PublicReadGetObject
              Effect: Allow
              Principal: '*'
              Action: 's3:GetObject'
              Resource: !Sub 'arn:aws:s3:::${ImageBucket}/*'
    RequestTrackingTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-requests
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: deviceId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: timestamp
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: deviceId
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: timestamp
            KeyType: RANGE
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: timestamp-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: timestamp
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
    # Cognito User Pool with Passkeys (WebAuthn) and Email fallback
    CognitoUserPool:
      Type: AWS::Cognito::UserPool
      Properties:
        UserPoolName: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-user-pool
        # Use UsernameAttributes for email-based authentication (only one of AliasAttributes or UsernameAttributes allowed)
        UsernameAttributes:
          - email
        UsernameConfiguration:
          CaseSensitive: false
        AutoVerifiedAttributes:
          - email
        EmailConfiguration:
          EmailSendingAccount: COGNITO_DEFAULT
        Policies:
          PasswordPolicy:
            MinimumLength: 8
            RequireUppercase: true
            RequireLowercase: true
            RequireNumbers: true
            RequireSymbols: false
        # Enable passkeys/WebAuthn as primary sign-in method
        UserPoolAddOns:
          AdvancedSecurityMode: OFF
        Schema:
          - Name: email
            Required: true
            Mutable: true
          - Name: name
            Required: false
            Mutable: true
        # MFA must be OFF for passwordless authentication (passkeys/email OTP)
        # Passkeys and Email OTP work with MFA set to OFF
        # Setting to OPTIONAL requires SMS configuration even if not used
        MfaConfiguration: OFF
        AccountRecoverySetting:
          RecoveryMechanisms:
            - Name: verified_email
              Priority: 1
        VerificationMessageTemplate:
          DefaultEmailOption: CONFIRM_WITH_CODE
          EmailSubject: 'Catfish: Verify your email'
          EmailMessage: 'Your verification code is {####}'
        UserAttributeUpdateSettings:
          AttributesRequireVerificationBeforeUpdate:
            - email
    # Cognito User Pool Domain (required for WebAuthn/Passkeys)
    CognitoUserPoolDomain:
      Type: AWS::Cognito::UserPoolDomain
      Properties:
        Domain: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}
        UserPoolId: !Ref CognitoUserPool
    # Cognito User Pool Client with Passkey and Email authentication flows
    CognitoUserPoolClient:
      Type: AWS::Cognito::UserPoolClient
      Properties:
        ClientName: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-client
        UserPoolId: !Ref CognitoUserPool
        GenerateSecret: false
        ExplicitAuthFlows:
          - ALLOW_USER_PASSWORD_AUTH
          - ALLOW_REFRESH_TOKEN_AUTH
          - ALLOW_USER_SRP_AUTH
        SupportedIdentityProviders:
          - COGNITO
        PreventUserExistenceErrors: ENABLED
        TokenValidityUnits:
          AccessToken: hours
          IdToken: hours
          RefreshToken: days
        AccessTokenValidity: 1
        IdTokenValidity: 1
        RefreshTokenValidity: 30
        # Enable passkey and email sign-in
        EnableTokenRevocation: true
        AuthSessionValidity: 3
        # Enable choice-based sign-in for Passkeys and Email OTP
        AllowedOAuthFlowsUserPoolClient: false
        # Note: Passkeys (WebAuthn) must be enabled via AWS Console or API after deployment
        # See COGNITO_SETUP.md for instructions
  Outputs:
    CognitoUserPoolId:
      Description: Cognito User Pool ID
      Value: !Ref CognitoUserPool
      Export:
        Name: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-user-pool-id
    CognitoUserPoolArn:
      Description: Cognito User Pool ARN
      Value: !GetAtt CognitoUserPool.Arn
      Export:
        Name: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-user-pool-arn
    CognitoUserPoolClientId:
      Description: Cognito User Pool Client ID
      Value: !Ref CognitoUserPoolClient
      Export:
        Name: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-user-pool-client-id
    CognitoUserPoolDomain:
      Description: Cognito User Pool Domain
      Value: !GetAtt CognitoUserPoolDomain.Domain
      Export:
        Name: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-user-pool-domain
    CognitoAuthUrl:
      Description: Cognito Hosted UI Auth URL
      Value: !Sub 
        - 'https://${Domain}.auth.${Region}.amazoncognito.com'
        - Domain: !GetAtt CognitoUserPoolDomain.Domain
          Region: ${self:provider.region}
      Export:
        Name: ${self:service}-${self:provider.stage}-auth-url
